name: The Witch Tree
description:
A man and his lover are hanged for witchcraft...

...and the villagers who wronged them suffer the consequences at the screams of a horror spawned from ancient legend.

The Witch Tree is a short action game featuring dark magic and dark humor. As a mandrake grown from the witches' magic, hunt down the villagers and avenge your masters!

This game contains explicit content.

    • Kill villagers with your Wilhelm Scream.
    • Find effigies to channel memories and learn about the witches' story.
    • Absorb all the villagers' souls, then enter the magic circle to complete the ritual.

This game was created during the QUILTBAG Game Jam in November of 2013.

Controls

Movement: WASD or arrow keys

Interaction: Spacebar

Exit Game: Esc

Development

Design: Susan Caldwell, Lily Ounekeo

Programming: Bill Caldwell

Art: Susan Caldwell, Lily Ounekeo

Level Design: Lily Ounekeo

Music: www.newgrounds.com

Sound: www.newgrounds.com

Story: Susan Caldwell, Lily Ounekeo

Information

Engine: GameMaker: Studio

Platform: Windows
